Section.Heading: Overview
Section.Description: The Analytic Information Server engine supplies a number of built-in trigonometric functions for operating on numbers. In addition to simple trigonometric functions, there are some arc cosine operations, exponential functions, logarithmic functions, and hyperbolic functions.

Section.Heading: Trig Functions
Section.Description: Here is a list of the links to the AIS built-in Trig Functions with their corresponding examples.
